## IRendererCallbacks.onBeforePlotDraw() method

Called once per frame, per plot drawn.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onBeforePlotDraw(context: TCtx, plotDimensions: IPlotDimensions, canvasDims: ICanvasDimensions): void;
```
